channel.title: Comments for Something Bold
channel.description: I do! Want my wedding to look fabulous. I don't! Have $20,000 to spend.

item.title: Comment on Wes Anderson-ish Save the Date by Erin-Kelley Taylor
item.dc:creator: Erin-Kelley Taylor

item.title: Comment on Heart On by JenW
item.dc:creator: JenW
item.description: I've wanted a pair since I first set eyes on them!!! So right- it's the heart!!
item.content:encoded: I’ve wanted a pair since I first set eyes on them!!! So right- it’s the heart!!

item.title: Comment on The Runaways by Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/the-runaways/#comment-73">JenW</a>.
I know! I've watched it several times, and it hasn't stopped making me weepy!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JenW.

I know! I’ve watched it several times, and it hasn’t stopped making me weepy!

item.title: Comment on The Runaways by JenW
item.dc:creator: JenW
item.description: Oh I got all teary-eyed watching that video... it was beautiful.
item.content:encoded: Oh I got all teary-eyed watching that video… it was beautiful.

item.title: Comment on Bargains Make Us Horny, Trois! by Missy
item.dc:creator: Missy
item.description: Loving all of the new posts! I can't wait to see what you have for us next.
item.content:encoded: Loving all of the new posts! I can’t wait to see what you have for us next.

item.title: Comment on She works hard for the money! by Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/she-works-hard-for-the-money/#comment-70">Denys</a>.
Denys. Please. My precious anonymity.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Denys.

Denys. Please. My precious anonymity.

item.title: Comment on She works hard for the money! by Denys
item.dc:creator: Denys
item.description: And, in case you were wondering, that's Sarah...looking at you from behind the window...in the blue shirt, with the dog and boy.
item.content:encoded: And, in case you were wondering, that’s Sarah…looking at you from behind the window…in the blue shirt, with the dog and boy.

item.title: Comment on The Runaways by Denys
item.dc:creator: Denys
item.description: I love this post! The wedding video you provided was wonderful. I have been in a wedding at San Francisco City Hall and it really is such a beautiful place for an elopement. I'm glad you're back!
item.content:encoded: I love this post! The wedding video you provided was wonderful. I have been in a wedding at San Francisco City Hall and it really is such a beautiful place for an elopement. I’m glad you’re back!

item.title: Comment on For richer or (mostly) poorer by Rachel

item.description: Jason your a wiener! Food is very important.
item.content:encoded: Jason your a wiener! Food is very important.
